summary: This mod is mini-addon for the game Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/21279-1-1389002353.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=5pt]DESCRIPTION[/size][/b][/center]
This mod is mini-addon for Skyrim.
A lot of adventures, both in vanilla and new locations, new enemies and friends, new opportunities and abilities, and a lot of other interesting things.
To begin your new adventures, become a friend of Azzi, and make her your follower. You can find her in The Bannered Mare in the evening or at night.
Be attentive, curious and witted in all locations of mod, do not miss all the most interesting (including a city full of people and quests).

[center][b][size=5pt]TRANSLATION AND VOICE ACTING[/size][/b][/center]
Mod is voiced in Russian, but the entire text, including subtitles, translated into English.
If you find mistakes in the mod or in translation, please let me know.
If you like mod, and you think that it lacks only the English voice acting, let's try to fix it:
Contact me if you want to participate in the dubbing of mod into English. The main character is Azzi, a girl's voice, but besides her in mod there are male and female characters.

[center][b][size=5pt]IMPORTANT[/b][/size][/center]
To begin mod's work, install it, launch the game and restart any save with this mode, for example, the autosave at the entrance to "The Bannered Mare". Withount it, no NPC in mod will not talk to you!

[center][b][size=5pt]INSTALLATION[/b][/size][/center]
1. Locate the 'Data/' folder in your Skyrim installation directory.
Typically it's found at 'Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/'.
2. Extract the contents of the downloaded archive file to the 'Data/' folder.
3. In the Skyrim Launcher, select 'Data Files' and enable 'Azzi.esm'.

[center][b][size=5pt]UNINSTALLATION[/b][/size][/center]
Delete 'Azzi.esm, 'Azzi.bsa' and folder "Music/Serafym71" from the data folder.

[center][size=5pt][b]REQUIREMENT[/b][/size]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/center]

[center][size=5pt][b]RECOMMENDED[/b][/size]
All female NPC of non-vanilla races in mod use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNPB-BBP body replacer[/url].
To use armor from mod for player character or your followers, install the skeleton with support for BBP.[/center]

[center][size=5pt][b]CREDITS[/b][/size]
All female NPCs of non-vanilla races in mod use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNPB-BBP body replacer[/url]. Credits go to all its creators.
Azzi uses [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]. Credits go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148/?]apachii[/url]
Azzi's outfit uses meshes from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16658/]Petrovich's UNP Simply Clothes[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by SydneyB[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20900/?]Bandanas of Skyrim by volvaga0[/url]. Credits go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/66282/?]Petrovich[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/259193/?]SydneyB[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3147615/?]volvaga0[/url].
Other armors in mod use some elements from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22168/]UNP - Hmm What To Wear[/url].Credits go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3076419/?]Nightasy[/url].
Mod uses [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43891/]Edhildils Dwemer Cyborg BBP[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/874446/?]Edhildil[/url]
Monster is from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/]Skyrim Immersive Creatures[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/336241/?]lifestorock[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3322711/?]Grohiik[/url][/center]

[center][size=5pt][b]MUSIC IN MOD[/b][/size]
Orion by Metallica
OST Silent Hill 2 movie
Mylene Farmer song
Songs of Ergyron Russian Chukcha Ethno Band

[size=5pt][b]GRAPHICS IN MOD[/b][/size]
by [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norval_Morrisseau]Norval Morrisseau[/url] (banners of Free Dit City, graphics of Kondraty)

[size=5pt][b][url=http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/kvesty/1/250-1-0-12250]ORIGINAL RUSSIAN VERSION OF MOD[/url][/b][/size][/center]
author: serafym71
